item.title: Need help with a fey things plz look
item.dc:creator: @Tenacious_T Tenacious T
item.description:
@Tenacious_T wrote:

Ok, Find the ID of the NPC you want to talk, Make sure you have it added to your server.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 920) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "SHABALABADINGDONG!"; } }

Ok, 920 is the ID number of the NPC.

SHABALABADINGDONG is what it says. (make sure u have Update required and textupdaterequired to true

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with a fey things plz look

item.title: Need help with a fey things plz look
item.dc:creator: @kevin727 kevin727
item.description:
@kevin727 wrote:

hi, i;m using source project16 v.6
and i have a few questions.
question 1: how cabn i change help menu when you are login
question 2: how can i a npc let talk i just going to npchandler.java and search for moo and under the last } i add this:

if (npcs.npcType == NPCIDHERE) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 6) {
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “TEXTOFNPC”;
}
}
andt hen i add the npc id by npcidehere and the text of the npc by textofnpc but when i login then they doesn;t say it5 can ianyone help me with this 2 things thank you.

Read full topic
